creator: thads_id@yahoo.com
text: For any visualizer the "Write All Data to a File" is broken.

The exception being thrown:

04/18/2003 3:21:08 PM ERROR - jmeter.elements:  org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: 
The root element is required in a well-formed document.

Appears that the file is trying to be opened and parsed even though the file 
doesn't exist or may be empty! Also, why is the sax parser being envoked when 
csv is the selected format?
creator: thads_id@yahoo.com
